The license has not been determined. Please feel to free try it before the official version (1.0.0) is released. In any case, the end user will use it for free. If you like this software, please contact us (devil@demonicsoft.com) to provide your valuable comments.

许可尚未确定，正式版本(1.0.0)发布前请随便试用，无论如何，最终用户都将免费使用，如果你喜欢本软件欢迎联系我们(devil@demonicsoft.com)提出您宝贵的意见。
